articles.author: Compiled by Kamva Somdyala
articles.title: India tour to South Africa to go ahead with minor tweaks, CSA confirms
articles.description: Cricket South Africa (CSA) confirmed that India's tour to the country will continue, with minor tweaks, amid concerns over the Omicron Covid-19 variant.
articles.content:
Cricket South Africa (CSA) confirmed that India's tour to the country will continue as originally scheduled, with minor tweaks, amid concerns over the Omicron Covid-19 variant.

articles.author: Aakash Arya
articles.title: New Zealand's Ajaz Patel 3rd Bowler To Take 10 Wickets In An Innings In Test Cricket History
articles.description: India vs New Zealand: Spinner Ajaz Patel became only the third player in Test cricket history to claim all 10 wickets in an innings.
articles.content: New Zealand spinner Ajaz Patel achieved the rarest of rare feats as he took all 10 wickets to fall in India's first innings in Mumbai, on day 2 of the second Test at the Wankhede Stadium. Ajaz Patel … [+1686 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: New Zealand’s Ajaz Patel takes 10 wickets in innings versus India
articles.description: Kiwi spinner becomes only the third bowler in Test cricket’s history to take all 10 wickets in an innings.
articles.content:
New Zealands Mumbai-born spinner Ajaz Patel has claimed all 10 wickets in the second Test against India, becoming only the third bowler in cricket history to achieve the feat.
Patel, a left-arm spin… [+387 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
